ValidationRule.description: Milestones required for NB opps stage 4
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( contains($Profile.Name, "Sales"), ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Enterprise"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "4 - Close Opportunity"), Stage_Number__c > PRIORVALUE(Stage_Number__c),
OR( K_Customer_validated_LD_met_tech_reqs__c = FALSE, L_Customer_validate_BVA_assessment__c = FALSE, M_LD_verbally_named_as_preferred_vendor__c = FALSE, N_Security_Review_Complete__c = FALSE ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check milestones K, L, M, & N to advance to stage 4
